DocAttribute.Name: StartDistAlong
DocAttribute.Documentation: Distance along the horizontal alignment, measured along the _IfcAlignment2DHorizontal_ given in the length unit of the global _IfcUnitAssignment_.

DocAttribute.Name: HorizontalLength
DocAttribute.Documentation: Length measured as distance along the horizontal alignment of the segment.

DocAttribute.Name: StartHeight
DocAttribute.Documentation: Elevation in Z of the start point relative to the IfcAlignment coordinate system. > NOTE  It is strongly advised to not offset the IfcAlignment coordinate system from the project engineering coordinate system.

DocAttribute.Name: EndGradient
DocAttribute.Documentation: End gradient of the segment. In the case of a PredefinedType='.CONSTANTGRADIENT.' the value is the same as _StartGradient_.

DocAttribute.Name: RadiusOfCurvature
DocAttribute.Documentation: Radius of parabola or arc. > NOTE1   For _PredefinedType_ is ARC. The radius of the basis circle for the arc. > NOTE2   For _PredefinedType_ is PARABOLICARC. Parabola constant (determining the “steepness” of the parabola). The parabola constant is provided by the “minimum parabola radius”, the true radius of a parabola at its vertical axis (the zero-gradient point of the parabola). The minimum radius is twice the focal length of the parabola (the distance between the focal point and the vertex). > NOTE3   For _PredefinedType_ that is not either ARC or PARABOLICARC the value should be empty.

DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Predefined type of the vertical alignmnent segment.
